column2: Take a torch from the campfire in Sootberme in Mount Maelstrom and use it to kill a Veteran Firefly.
Take a torch from the campfire in Sootberme in Mount Maelstrom and use it to kill a Veteran Jungle Spider.
Adds a 25%% movement speed bonus to the boons applied by the guild's aura around claimed objectives.
Take a souvenir from the Ancient Coffer at the Plaza of Lost Wisdom in Straits of Devastation.
Use the Illuminator to capture the light near the teleportation stone at the bottom of Griffonrook Run in Lornar's Pass.
Double-click to unlock the first collection in the journey to craft Dusk, the precursor to the Legendary Greatsword, Twilight.
Use your Ooze Terrarium to house a tiny ooze gathered from translucent oozes.
Recipe purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs.
Use a Glacial Imbued Jar to collect ice shavings from the large pillar of ice found in the Tribulation Caverns in Dredgehaunt Cliffs.
Disguise yourself as a Flame Legion soldier and attack the Separatist camp in the Oldgate Clearing of Diessa Plateau.
Harvested from the common Jellyfish of Central Tyria.
Pulled from sharks in Bloodtide Coast, Sparkfly Fen, or Mount Maelstrom.
Kneel before the Colossus in the Cliffside Fractal after freeing him from his bonds.
Collect a living ice fragment from an Ice Elemental in Snowden Drifts.
No matter, for time is on our side. While my Mordrem multiply, your numbers dwindle.
Use the Gloominator to capture the darkness in the center of the Tangled Labyrinth in the Silverwastes.
Plant zucchini seeds in your hidden garden in Mount Maelstrom. Zucchini seeds can be found while harvesting zucchini.
Leave a tribute of 100 Piles of Bloodstone Dust at the Jotun Holy Site at Theign Kenning in Dredgehaunt Cliffs.
Use a Glacial Imbued Jar to collect ice shavings from the Talecrafting Steading in Dredgehaunt Cliffs.
Use a Glacial Imbued Jar to collect and freeze water taken from the waterfall near Bramble Pass in Straits of Devastation.
Created by combining ooze essences in the Ooze Terrarium.
Prank Ellen Kiel in Lion's Arch by throwing a Confetti Pouch at her.
Find a refugee in Zintl Holy Grounds in Sparkfly Fen who can tell you about hylek artwork.
Perform a Flip-Spin-Double-Flip using the Cantle of Sky diving goggles in Mount Maelstrom.
Block attacks while striking foes in front of you, gaining barrier with each enemy you hit.
Plant pumpkin seeds in your hidden garden in Mount Maelstrom. Pumpkin seeds can be found while harvesting pumpkins.
Use a Krait Focusing Crystal to commune with the Krait Obelisk Shard in Sparkfly Fen.
Take a canvas, paintbrush, and a jar of yellow paint to the scenic vantage point by Pyrite Peninsula in Malchor's Leap.
Sweep the ground, blinding enemies in front of you.
+10%% Kill Gold and 15%% Magic Find Banner[s]
Talk to Evon Gnashblade in Lion's Arch.
Use the laboratory equipment found in the Thaumanova Reactor Fractal to mix a blend of Destructive Substance and your Searing Concoction to form Ever-Burning Fuel.
Spawns a guild banner that will give +10%% karma and +10%% experience from kills for 30 minutes to any ally that touches it. Does not stack with other karma or experience banners.
Collect the sheet music for Wiley's Work Song from Wiley pirates.
Recipe purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs.
Use a Capacitive Bottle to capture energy from an Aetherblade Striker's channeled lightning attack.
Bring an Anthology of Heroes to the defeat of Ivor Trueshot, Armsman Pitney, Farrah Cappo, and Horace on the Old Duke's Estate in Plains of Ashford.
You take reduced physical and condition damage.
Pilfered from the jotun around Hessdallen Kenning in Dredgehaunt Cliffs.
Thank you for playing the Heart of Thorns story.
Become ghostly from consuming a strawberry ghost.
Leave a tribute of 100 Piles of Bloodstone Dust at the Ancient Runestone of Leaning Grade in Dredgehaunt Cliffs.
Examine the wreckage of the clockwork marionette in Lornar's Pass.
Scribing: Guild Gathering and Swiftness Banner
The Exalted sacrifice only delays the inevitable. Surrender to the truth. You cannot stop that which grows forever.
Use the Gloominator to capture the darkness in the Prosperity Mines in Dry Top.
Found in the Karka Queen's chest.
Withdraw funds from the small guild stash.
You can now trade with the Nuhoch. Mastery vendors can be found across the Maguuma Jungle and are marked by Mastery icons on the map.
Double-click to unlock the first collection in the journey to craft The Lover, the precursor to the Legendary Short Bow, The Dreamer.
The Music of the Burning Ships
Use the wreckage of the Breachmaker in Lion's Arch to add ley-line energy to a piece of charged quartz.
Use a Capacitive Bottle to capture energy from a lightning turret in the Thaumanova Reactor Fractal.
You can now interact with Exalted artifacts found in Auric Basin and the greater Maguuma Jungle.
Disguise yourself as a cow and demonstrate combat techniques to the cattle of Wodron Glens in Diessa Plateau.
Evade attacks and hurl damaging daggers, dealing multiple conditions to enemies.
Burn a Heart of the Megadestroyer in the cauldron at Division Shrine in Fireheart Rise.
Bring an Anthology of Heroes to the defeat of Tequatl the Sunless in Sparkfly Fen.
Imbue a Superior Sigil of Dreams at Ventari's Tablet in the Omphalos Chamber of the Grove.

Spawns a guild banner that will give a +10%% boost to gold from kills and a +15%% boost to Magic Find for any ally that touches it for 30 minutes. Does not stack with other gold or Magic Find banners.
Upgrade your account with a Guild Wars 2 expansion.
Created after feeding food items to your Tiny Chromatic Ooze.
Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to learn the secrets of superior forging tools.
You need chak acid to open this pod.
Kneel before Fen, who resides near the Bonerattler Caverns of the Harathi Hinterlands.
Push nearby enemies away from you.
Use a Glacial Imbued Jar to collect ice shavings from the ice pillar at end of the Underground Facility Fractal.
Perform a Double Flip, Spin, Flip using the Cantle of Sun diving goggles in Mount Maelstrom.
Bring an Anthology of Heroes to the Tower of Nightmares in Kessex Hills.
Save Zephyrites from Inquest captivity in Dry Top.
Use the Gloominator to capture the gloom in the treasure room of the Behem Gauntlet jumping puzzle in Blazeridge Steppes.
Combine the Jotun Star Fragments in the ruins of Leaning Grade in Dredgehaunt Cliffs.
Ponder the ruins of the Temple of the Ages in Queensdale.
Weapon manual for Mai Trin's airship obtained from Mai Trin's chest after defeating her in her boss fractal.

Dungeon Merchant
• Buy Dungeon Armor
• Buy Dungeon Weapons
Your <c=@abilitytype>facet</c> passives affect additional targets and you retain them for a duration after using their <c=@abilitytype>consume</c> abilities.
Purchased from Arcanist Vance in the ruins of the Granite Citadel in Dredgehaunt Cliffs after helping him study the Dwarven relics.
Ponder the statue of Balthazar after cleansing the Cathedral of Glorious Victory.
Defend the Pact encampment against hylek attacks.
Pulse protection to nearby allies every few seconds.
Double-click to create a demo character.
Talk to the ghost of Cicely Otterly in the Shaemoor farms of Queensdale when she appears at night.
Coat yourself with your Mystic Chromatic Ooze and get hit by the poisoned environment while fighting Old Tom in the Uncategorized Fractal.
Found in the Font of Rhand chest.
Prank the Arcane Council in Rata Sum by throwing a Confetti Pouch at one of their members.
Use the Gloominator to capture the gloom while in the Lair of the Coil in Timberline Falls.
Newly unlocked accounts require validation. This feature will unlock in %str1%.
Use the Illuminator to capture the light of the hidden grotto in the Grove.
Kill the Champion Krait Hypnoss in Sparkfly Fen.
Use the Gloominator to capture the darkness in Rabsovich's room in the Underground Facility Fractal.
Kill Chief Otyugh in Fields of Ruin.
Acquire putrid ichor from the chest after defeating Tequatl the Sunless in Sparkfly Fen.
While wielding a staff, gain endurance for each initiative point spent. Gain bonus power, which is increased when wielding a staff.
Use a bucket purchased from Milton Book in Gendarran Fields and fill it with water from the secret grotto in the Garden of Dawn in the Grove. Then use it to water your hidden garden.
The ground-target marker will reposition itself to your current target's position so long as it is within range.
Adrenal mushrooms can be found rarely in the Heart of Maguuma. Simply move near or pass through adrenal mushrooms to have all your skills instantly refreshed.
Dive into the ocean using diving goggles in the Shattered Ice Ruins of Frostgorge Sound.
You must distill this near the Frost Portal in the Drakkar Spurs.
Bring an Anthology of Heroes to the ruins of Fort Salma in Kessex Hills.
<c=@abilitytype>Celestial Avatar.</c> Gather tidal force to rapidly heal nearby allies.
Help the Pact gain control of the Temple of Dwayna in Malchor's Leap.
Allowed to edit options at guild-owned claimables.
SMS verification or additional authentication is required before you can use this feature.
Speak to a Master Huntsman to discover the secret to balancing a horn.
<c=@abilitytype>Glyph.</c> Inflict bleeding and debilitate nearby foes.
Speak to a Master Artificer to discover the art of magical woodworking.
Take a torch from the grawl villages in Fireheart Rise and use it to kill a Veteran Oakheart.
Used in the Mystic Forge to create the Eternal Sands focus and to make Polish, used in precursor crafting.
Team captains are allowed to add and remove members from the team, as are guild members with the Team Administrator permission. There can only be one captain.
Gain increased movement speed for each point of upkeep currently in use.
Prank Knut Whitebear in Hoelbrak by throwing a Confetti Pouch at him.
You need a pact machete to open this pod.
Detonate the sphere to cause it to explode, damaging and chilling foes.
Throw a trickster's pie at the Sand Giant in Dry Top.
Defend Lornar's Pass from an insurgence of steam creatures.
Acquire an icy core from the chest after defeating the Svanir Shaman Chief at the Frozen Maw in Wayfarer Foothills.
Coat yourself with your Mystic Chromatic Ooze and fall for 10 seconds without touching the ground.
Loot Aliyana's Locket from risen around Murkvale in Mount Maelstrom, and return it to Crusader Aliyana.

Instanced mission in which members work together to overcome various tasks involving: protecting NPCs or objects, defeating hostile NPCs, destroying objects in rapid succession, or surviving for a set amount of time.
Burn Claw of Jormag's Scale in the cauldron at Division Shrine in Fireheart Rise.
Use a Capacitive Bottle to capture energy from a spark at Opticalium's lab in Metrica Province.
Extricate stranded nobles from vine chambers, and escort them to safety.
Test an Emerald Crystal with a Jade Maw Lens at the Metal Forest in the Pyrite Peninsula in Malchor's Leap.
<c=@abilitytype>Symbol.</c> Fire a slow, arcing arrow that explodes on impact to burn targets and sear a symbol of energy into the ground.

Spawns a guild banner that will give +10%% karma, +15%% magic find, +10%% experience from kills, +10%% gold from kills, +10%% increased movement speed, and +15%% gathering chance for 30 minutes to any ally that touches it. Does not stack with other banner boosts.
Find the Prototype Dredge Weapon in Wayfarer Foothills.
Plant ghost-pepper seeds in your hidden garden in Mount Maelstrom. Ghost-pepper seeds can be found while harvesting ghost peppers.
Account upgrades required. Click for details.
Double-click to apply to an item with an unused upgrade slot.

<c=@abilitytype>Celestial Avatar.</c> Channel your celestial powers, pulsing cripple and slow. Once the channel ends, any foes still within its radius will be trapped by a black hole, immobilizing them.
Use a Capacitive Bottle to capture energy from a chak energy attack.
Bring an Anthology of Heroes to the defeat of the Legendary Sand Giant in Dry Top.
Burn a Heart of a Fire Imp in the cauldron at Division Shrine in Fireheart Rise.
Use your Ooze Terrarium to house a tiny ooze gathered from yellow oozes.
Help the charr reclaim their homeland in the Urban Battleground Fractal.
Throw a trickster's pie at Tequatl the Sunless in Sparkfly Fen.
Gain endurance when you successfully steal from an enemy.
